LLM Answer:
To turn on the TV with the remote control, you need to grab the remote control, point it at the TV, 
and push the power button.

Goal Representation:
behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind tv: item where:
            is_television(tv)
        bind remote: item where:
            is_remote_control(remote) and inhand(remote)
        achieve close_char(char, tv)
        achieve facing_char(char, tv)
        achieve is_on(tv)

behavior use_remote_to_turn_on_tv(remote_control:item, television:item):
    body:
        achieve_once inhand(remote_control)
        achieve close_char(char, television)
        achieve facing_char(char, television)
        achieve facing(remote_control, television)
        push(remote_control)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind remote_control: item where:
            is_remote_control(remote_control)
        bind television: item where:
            is_television(television)
        use_remote_to_turn_on_tv(remote_control, television)

behavior face_tv(tv:item, remote_control:item):
    body:
        achieve close_char(char, tv)
        achieve close(remote_control, char)
        achieve facing_char(char, tv)

behavior turn_on_tv(remote_control:item, tv:item):
    body:
        push(remote_control)
        achieve is_on(tv)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind tv: item where:
            is_television(tv)
        bind remote_control: item where:
            is_remote_control(remote_control)
        face_tv(tv, remote_control)
        turn_on_tv(remote_control, tv)
